user_dm.warn: You were warned in **{guild}** with the reason: {reason}
user_dm.mute: You were muted in **{guild}** for `{duration}` with the reason: {reason}
user_dm.kick: You were kicked from **{guild}** with the reason: {reason}
user_dm.softban: You were softbanned from **{guild}** with the reason: {reason}. This is not a permanent ban, only a kick that also removes all your messages.
user_dm.tempban: You were banned from **{guild}** for `{duration}` with the reason: {reason}
user_dm.ban: You were banned from **{guild}** with the reason: {reason}

automod_reasons.invite: Automatic action carried out for posting an invite link to **{target}** in {channel}: `.gg/{code}`.
automod_reasons.duplicate: Automatic action carried out for posting duplicate messages.
automod_reasons.phishing: Automatic action carried out for posting a possible phising link.
automod_reasons.zalgo: Automatic action carried out for posting a message with zalgo text.
automod_reasons.spam: Automatic action carried out for hitting the message rate limit ({amount}/{duration}).
automod_reasons.mention: Automatic action carried out for hitting the mention rate limit ({amount}/{duration}).
